text: When I was in the first grade I was afraid of the teacher and had a miserable time in the reading circle, a difficulty that was overcome by the loving patience of my second grade teacher. Even though I could read, I refused to do so.
author: Beverly Cleary

text: Give your dog or cat respect, patience, understanding and love. And if you just change to one vegetarian day a week, that's a wonderful step that will save animal lives. It means you have chosen something kind instead of something cruel.
author: Ingrid Newkirk

text: In movies, there are some things the French do that Americans are increasingly incapable of doing. One is honoring the complexities of youth. It's a quiet, difficult undertaking, requiring subtlety in a filmmaker and perception and patience from us.
author: Wesley Morris

text: I have no patience at all.
author: Alan Sugar

text: Writing is good, thinking is better. Cleverness is good, patience is better.
author: Herman Hesse
